rules_text:
{3}{G}{G}: If this creature isn't onstage, it takes the stage. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
When this creature takes the stage, legendary creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“It's animatronic! We have complete control.”
—Some idiot[/i]
